review: I love this thing.The instructions on how to work it were very clear, you actually have to download a "chromecast" app on your devices, but its totally worth it.Many of the entertainment I is on YouTube, so this makes it so much enjoyable to be able to watch it on the TV.If you use the Chrome browser, you can also chrome cast tabs, which comes in handy when watching something on a site that isn't YouTube.The ONLY thing that seems to not work, is Amazon Prime. It will not display the video on there, which is a bummer, because I would have to hard-wire the laptop to the TV via an HDMI to watch anything on Amazon Prime.But that's kind of understandable, since Amazon has the "Fire Stick" which allows you to watch your Prime stuff on your TV.Aside from that, its fantastic, my housemates and I use it all the time to share videos and what not to each other.We love it.
author: Ashraf A. Dawod "Ash"
